name: Social Isolation of PSNs
description: Tactically reducing the social power of PSNs by dismantling their support networks.

cards.title: Severing Influence Chains
cards.description: Breaking their network of enablers and manipulators.
bulletpoints: Identifying key figures in their social hierarchy and neutralizing their influence.
Isolating them by encouraging their close associates to distance themselves.
Using controlled information leaks to expose their private manipulative strategies.

cards.title: Exposing PSNs to Their Social Circles
cards.description: Ensuring their true nature is revealed to those around them.
bulletpoints: Using their own words and actions to create undeniable proof of their manipulation.
Encouraging independent validation of their behavior through open discussion.
Setting up scenarios that force them to reveal their true nature publicly.

cards.title: Neutralizing PSN Strongholds
cards.description: Targeting their most secure areas of control.
bulletpoints: Disrupting their leadership positions by exposing their unethical actions.
Creating social resistance within groups they dominate.
Implementing strategies that force them to relocate or disengage from a position of power.
